author: Lesley Waters
method: Place the grated potato and parsnip onto a clean tea towel and squeeze over a bowl to remove the excess liquid. Melt the butter with the oil in a frying pan over a medium heat, add the grated potato and parsnip, press down and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Fry the rösti for 2-3 minutes on each side, using a fish slice to carefully turn it over, until crisp and golden-brown. To serve, place the rösti onto a plate and sprinkle over the parsley.
ingredients: ½ parsnip, peeled, cored and grated,  ½ small potato, peeled and grated,  50g/2oz unsalted butter,  1 tbsp olive oil ,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  1 tsp chopped fresh parsley, to garnish
